!INDEX.html              Long index format
lilo-21.tar.gz           Generic boot loader for Linux
lilo-colors-1.21.1.tar.gz patch to lilo version 20 that enables it to use color for boot messages
lilo-disk-by-mountpoint-0.1.patch.gz Patch to lilo-20 to allow disk= stanzas to be specified by mount point
lilo-t-21.ps.gz          PostScript technical specs for lilo
lilo-u-21.ps.gz          PostScript manual for lilo
